DOC.brief_summary: In this trial we compare the effect of 2 closure techniques of the rectus sheath during cesarean sections on postoperative pain. One closure technique is double lock technique and the other is the conventional continuous non-locking technique.
DOC.brief_title: Double Lock Versus Continuous Non-locking Technique for Closure of Rectus Sheath in Cesarean Sections on Post-operative Pain
DOC.criteria: first cesarean section urgent cesarean section previous abdominal surgery previous cesarean section obstetric and medical complications
